channel.title: algorithm on std::bodun:blog
channel.description: Recent content in algorithm on std::bodun:blog

item.title: Congruence Closure
item.description: This is a summary of how to compute congruence closure. I implemented the algorithm to compute congruence closure and thought I’d never forget it.

item.title: Performance Anamoly of 802.11b
item.description: This research is conducted by Martin Heusse, Franck Rousseau, Cilles Berger-Sabbatel, Andrzej Duda on analyzing the performance of the IEEE 802.

item.title: Singular Value Decomposition
item.description: Unitary matrices and the Singular Value Decomposition (SVD) are two important concepts in linear algebra. In order to fully understand these concepts, we will need to first discuss orthogonality.

item.title: Understanding Probabilistic Clock Synchronization
item.description: This post is meant to discuss the probabilistic clock synchronization technique. The main goal of this technique is to bound the difference between systems by setting up an upper bound.
